text: Dreams of Stabbing And/Or Being Stabbed is the first EP of American rock band My Chemical Romance released in December 2001. It was recorded in the band's first drummer, Matt Pelisser's attic. This EP is also known as "The Attic Demos", as the songs were demos of songs in I Brought You My Bullets, You Brought Me Your Love. == Track Listing == # Turnstiles (Skylines and Turnstiles) # Bring More Knives (Our Lady of Sorrows) # Cubicles # Early Sunsets Over Monroeville Category:2001 albums Category:My Chemical Romance albums
title: Dreams of Stabbing And/Or Being Stabbed
